mil3.1.2:1.3: “Ke te, bhante, satta, tvam va satta, ganana va satta”ti?
mil3.1.2:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena milindassa ranno sabbabharanapatimanditassa alankatapatiyattassa pathaviyam chaya dissati, udakamanike ca chaya dissati.
mil3.1.2:2.2: Atha kho ayasma nagaseno milindam rajanam etadavoca—
mil3.1.2:2.3: “ayam te, maharaja, chaya pathaviyam udakamanike ca dissati, kim pana, maharaja, tvam va raja, chaya va raja”ti?
mil3.1.2:2.4: “Aham, bhante nagasena, raja, nayam chaya raja, mam pana nissaya chaya pavattati”ti.
mil3.1.2:2.5: “Evameva kho, maharaja, vassanam ganana satta, na panaham satta, mam pana nissaya satta pavattati, chayupamam, maharaja”ti.
mil3.1.2:2.6: “Acchariyam, bhante nagasena, abbhutam, bhante nagasena, aticitrani panhapatibhanani visajjitani”ti.
